decision_conditions: The proposed hip to gable roof extension, rear dormer extension, installation of 2no.x front rooflights to facilitate a loft conversion and changes to fenestration of rear and side elevations falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B & Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Plan Scale issues - the submitted plans have a stated scale of 1:50 but the scale bar does not measure correctly. The annotated dimensions are also incorrect. See extracts below. Please check and amend the plan scales and re-submit.
